snippet: Players on Georgetown’s men’s basketball team pointed to an unfortunate brawl on a good-will tour of China last summer for their strengthened bond and resurgence this season.
abstract: Players on Georgetown's men’s basketball team point to an unfortunate brawl on a good-will tour of China last summer for their strengthened bond and resurgence this season; team is preparing for the Big East tournament.
lead_paragraph: Players on Georgetown’s men’s basketball team pointed to an unfortunate brawl on a good-will tour of China last summer for their strengthened bond and resurgence this season.

headline.seo: Georgetown Says Team Unity Started With Fight in China
headline.main: For Hoyas, a Fight in China Forged Team Unity
headline.print_headline: For Hoyas, a Fight in China Forged Team Unity
